actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: Congratulating Marcel Closset, a French citizen and former member of the French Resistance who was instrumental in saving a United States Army Air Corps pilot during World War II, for receiving the French Legion of Honor.

summary.text: Congratulates Marcel Closset for receiving the French Legion of Honor.

titles.title: Congratulating Marcel Closset, a French citizen and former member of the French Resistance who was instrumental in saving a United States Army Air Corps pilot during World War II, for receiving the French Legion of Honor.
